summary: Ever wanted more Lore Friendly Music? Well why not try out this mod? And don't worry I asked permission from all the owners.
descriptionHtml: I always loved Skyrim music but I also always wanted to add my own. This mod is a collection of my favourite lore friendly music, whether they be Celtic or soft Piano. And don't worry about Copyright issues, I asked permission from the users and some are under Royalty free or Creative Commons.I also promised I would credit the Composers and Muscians with a link to their webistes or channels.Matti Paalanen Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/mattipaalanencomposer/?fref=tsVindsvept Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/VindsveptMickan44 Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=mickan44If there are any problems with the mod please message me -Taz
author: Redoran1705
